sourcesContent:
<script setup>
import { ref } from 'vue'
import { useStore } from 'vuex'
const store = useStore()
const logNavLink=ref("");
const logNavView=ref("");
logNavLink.value = !store.state.authenticated ? "Login":"Salir";
logNavView.value = !store.state.authenticated ? "login":"logout";

</script>

<template>
  <nav>
    {{store.state.authenticated}}
    <router-link :to="{name:'home'}">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name:'naves'}">Naves</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name:'actors'}">Actores</router-link> |
    <router-link v-if="!store.state.authenticated " :to="{name:'register'}">Registrarse</router-link>|
    <router-link :to="{name:logNavView}">{{logNavLink}}</router-link>
    {{logNavLink}}   
    {{logNavView}}
  </nav>
</template>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped>
nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}
nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
